Madlibs_Worksheet:
The day i saw the Monkey King {verb} was one of the most interesting days of the year.
 After he did that, the king played chess on his brother's {noun} and then combed his {adjective} hair with a comb made out of old fish bones.
 Later that same day, i saw the Monkey King dance {adverb} in fornt of an audience of kangaroos and wombats.
